import {Form,FormGroup,ListGroup,ListGroupItem,Button} from 'reactstrap' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import React,{useState} from 'react'; import "./Booking.css" const Booking = ({tour,avgRating}) => { const {price,reviews}=tour; const navigate=useNavigate() const [credentials,setCredentials]=useState({ userId:'01', userEmail:'example@gmail.com', FullName:'', phone:'', guestSize:1, bookAt:'', }) const handleChange=e=>{ setCredentials(prev=>({...prev,[e.target.id]:e.target.value})) } const serviceFee=10 const totalAmount= Number(price) * Number(credentials.guestSize)+Number(serviceFee) const handleClick=e=>{ e.preventDefault() navigate('/thank-you') } return (

${price}/per person

{avgRating===0?null :avgRating}({reviews?.length})
Information
${price} 1 person
${price}
Service charge
${serviceFee}
Total
${totalAmount}
); } export default Booking;
